[api/model/chat](/api/modules/api_model_chat.md).EphemeralDuration

Æ¬ **EphemeralDuration**: ``86400`` \| ``604800`` \| ``7776000``

Ephemeral duration can be 1 day, 7 days or 90 days. The default is 1 day.
